title: Returning John Barclay on a mission for Scotland against Russia as he eyes Japan decider spot
text:
John Barclay reassumes the Scotland captaincy on Wednesday morning with both a point to prove and a bonus point to gain against Russia in the Shizuoka Stadium Ecopa.

Barclay was one of several players who were dropped by head coach Gregor Townsend following Scotland’s opening round 27-3 defeat to Ireland.
